akn:section.akn:heading: Willfulness requirement for penalties against individuals

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 21304. Willfulness requirement for penalties against individuals A civil penalty under this subchapter may be imposed against an individual only for a willful violation. An individual is deemed not to have committed a willful violation if the individual was following the direct order of a railroad carrier official or supervisor under protest communicated to the official or supervisor. The individual is entitled to document the protest. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 893.)
